title: Boutique Waterfront Apartment Escape at Gippsland Lakes
description: Escape the city for a blissful waterside escape to the Gippsland Lakes, Victoria, a four-hour drive and a world away from Melbourne. Stay in a boutique self-contained apartment with late checkout at 5 Knots, spectacularly nestled on a peninsula on the lakes, in the coastal village of Metung. Explore this picturesque coast with its rich history, beautiful beach, bushwalking tracks, restaurants, galleries and abundance of wildlife, including native dolphins.

title: Boutique Waterfront Apartment Escape at Gippsland Lakes
description: Escape the city for a blissful waterside escape to the Gippsland Lakes, Victoria, a four-hour drive and a world away from Melbourne. Stay in a boutique self-contained apartment with included parking and complimentary Wi-Fi at 5 Knots Metung. These stylish apartments are spectacularly nestled on a peninsula on the lakes, in the coastal village of Metung. Explore this picturesque coast with its rich history, beautiful beach, bushwalking tracks, restaurants, galleries and abundance of wildlife, including native dolphins.
